name: BloodCaller
description: SpiritWalkers who have abandoned traditional spellcasting in favor of blood magic and alchemical potions, gaining powerful combat abilities and automatic magical effects that trigger in response to their actions or conditions.

resource_systems.name: Blood Power
resource_systems.description: Vital energy drawn from blood that replaces traditional mana
resource_systems.regeneration: 5 per 6 seconds, +8 when consuming blood or during combat
mechanics: Blood Power replaces mana entirely for BloodCallers
Can be generated by sacrificing health (1 health = 2 Blood Power)
Consuming blood from enemies restores significant Blood Power
Maximum Blood Power increases temporarily when below 30% health
Can be infused into weapons, potions, and blood totems for enhanced effects
Higher Blood Power increases the potency of all potion effects and procs

resource_systems.name: Spirit Attunement
resource_systems.description: Connection to the spirit world that enhances spiritual abilities
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when communing with spirits of violence and power, decreases when showing mercy
mechanics: Increases by 20 when performing blood rituals or sacrifices
Increases by 15 per minute when in places of great bloodshed or suffering
Decreases by 20 when showing mercy to enemies
Decreases by 15 per minute when in places of healing or peace
Can be spent to enhance blood magic or bind spirits to potions
Higher Spirit Attunement increases the duration of potion effects

resource_systems.name: Planar Resonance
resource_systems.description: Harmony with the different planes of existence that allows for dimensional manipulation
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when traversing between planes or communing with extraplanar entities of chaos
mechanics: Increases by 15 when successfully traversing between planes
Increases by 10 when binding extraplanar essences to potions
Decreases by 15 when refusing to exploit planar weaknesses
Decreases by 10 when remaining in a single plane for extended periods
Can be spent to infuse potions with extraplanar energies
Higher Planar Resonance allows for more powerful potion procs

resource_systems.name: Alchemical Mastery
resource_systems.description: Expertise in creating and utilizing magical potions and elixirs
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when creating or consuming potions, or when potion procs activate
mechanics: Increases by 15 when creating a new potion recipe
Increases by 10 when a potion proc activates at a critical moment
Decreases by 5 per hour when no potions are active in your system
Can be spent to enhance potion effects or trigger procs manually
At maximum Alchemical Mastery, all potion durations are doubled and proc chances increased by 50%

class_mechanics.name: Potion Infusion
class_mechanics.description: Advanced system of creating, consuming, and benefiting from magical potions
effects: Can have up to 5 different potion effects active simultaneously
Each potion provides both a constant passive effect and conditional procs
Procs trigger automatically in response to specific actions or conditions
Potions can be quickly consumed in combat without interrupting actions
Can infuse allies or coat weapons with potions for additional effects

class_mechanics.name: Blood Magic
class_mechanics.description: Ability to use blood as a catalyst for powerful magical effects
effects: Can sacrifice health to power especially potent abilities
Blood drawn from enemies can be used to enhance attacks or create barriers
Able to sense blood and track bleeding targets across great distances
Can manipulate the blood of enemies to slow, weaken, or control them
Presence causes unease and accelerated heartbeats in nearby creatures

class_mechanics.name: Spirit Binding
class_mechanics.description: Ability to bind spirits to blood, potions, and physical vessels
effects: Can trap spirits in potions to create specific magical effects
Able to bind spirits to weapons for enhanced damage and special abilities
Can create blood totems that house spirits for persistent area effects
Bound spirits can be released to perform specific tasks or attacks
Can force spirits to trigger potion procs on command

class_mechanics.name: Adaptive Physiology
class_mechanics.description: Body that has been transformed by constant exposure to potions and blood magic
effects: Immune to most poisons and diseases
Can temporarily adapt physical form based on consumed potions
Blood regenerates at twice the normal rate
Can absorb the properties of consumed magical substances
Presence causes normal potions to become more potent

signature_abilities.name: Alchemical Transformation
signature_abilities.description: Undergo a complete physical transformation based on all active potions
mechanics: For 5 minutes, all active potion effects are tripled in potency
Gain a unique physical form that combines aspects of all active potions
All potion procs have 100% activation chance during this period
Can consume additional potions during this state for immediate full effects
At the end of the duration, suffer moderate backlash based on the potency of active potions
Costs 100 Blood Power, 50 Spirit Attunement, and 75 Alchemical Mastery

signature_abilities.name: Blood Harvest
signature_abilities.description: Extract blood from all enemies in an area for power and healing
mechanics: All enemies within 30 meters suffer significant bleed damage
Blood extracted is converted to health and Blood Power for you
Creates blood pools on the ground that can be used for additional abilities
Affected enemies are weakened and slowed for 1 minute
For each enemy killed by this ability, gain a temporary increase to maximum Blood Power
Costs 75 Blood Power, 30 Spirit Attunement, and 50 Planar Resonance

signature_abilities.name: Master Mixology
signature_abilities.description: Instantly create and consume a perfect blend of potions tailored to the current situation
mechanics: Automatically analyze the current situation and create the ideal potion blend
Instantly gain 5 perfectly complementary potion effects without consuming inventory items
Each potion effect includes both its passive benefit and a guaranteed initial proc
Effects last for 10 minutes and have double the normal potency
After the duration ends, gain significant Alchemical Mastery based on how effectively the potions were utilized
Costs 50 Blood Power, 100 Alchemical Mastery, and 25 Planar Resonance

skill_trees.name: Path of the Alchemist
key_abilities: Perfect Mixture: Create potions with multiple effects and procs
Catalytic Reaction: Cause all active potions to trigger their procs simultaneously
Endless Flask: Create potions that replenish themselves over time

skill_trees.name: Path of the Hemomancer
key_abilities: Blood Puppet: Control an enemy by manipulating their blood
Crimson Armor: Create protective armor from hardened blood
Blood Explosion: Cause enemies with bleed effects to violently explode

skill_trees.name: Path of the Flesh Shaper
key_abilities: Monstrous Transformation: Temporarily transform into a powerful monstrous form
Adaptive Mutation: Develop permanent beneficial mutations from potion use
Flesh Grafting: Absorb parts of defeated enemies for their abilities

quests: Blood Pact with the Ancient Ones
Theft of the Forbidden Alchemical Texts
advancement_requirements.skill_points: At least 15 points in the Elemental Harmony skill tree
advancement_requirements.alignment: Must maintain Evil alignment for at least 10 levels
challenges: Create and consume 10 unique potion types
Defeat a powerful enemy using only blood magic

potion_system.description: The BloodCaller's unique system of magical potions that replace traditional spellcasting

potion_types.name: Berserker's Brew
potion_types.passive_effect: Strength increased by 30%, attack speed increased by 20%

proc_effects.name: Blood Frenzy
proc_effects.effect: Double attack speed and damage for 10 seconds

proc_effects.name: Unstoppable Rage
proc_effects.trigger: When striking the same target 5 times consecutively
proc_effects.effect: Next attack is guaranteed to critically hit and applies a bleed effect

potion_types.name: Shadowblood Elixir
potion_types.passive_effect: 30% chance to avoid attacks, movement speed increased by 25%

proc_effects.name: Shadow Step
proc_effects.trigger: When taking damage that would reduce health below 30%
proc_effects.effect: Teleport to a safe location within 20 meters and enter stealth for 5 seconds

proc_effects.name: Umbral Strike
proc_effects.trigger: When attacking from stealth or from behind
proc_effects.effect: Attack deals 200% damage and applies a 3-second stun

potion_types.name: Essence of the Leech
potion_types.passive_effect: All attacks heal for 10% of damage dealt, maximum health increased by 20%

proc_effects.name: Vampiric Surge
proc_effects.effect: Next 5 attacks heal for 50% of damage dealt and steal a portion of the target's maximum health

proc_effects.name: Blood Bond
proc_effects.effect: Create a blood link with nearest enemy that transfers 5% of their health to you every 3 seconds for 15 seconds

potion_types.name: Elemental Blood Infusion
potion_types.passive_effect: Attacks deal additional elemental damage (type depends on creation), 20% resistance to all elemental damage

proc_effects.name: Elemental Eruption
proc_effects.effect: Release an explosion of elemental energy dealing significant area damage

proc_effects.name: Elemental Absorption
proc_effects.effect: Absorb the energy and gain immunity to that element for 10 seconds, next attack releases absorbed energy

potion_types.name: Mindrender Tonic
potion_types.passive_effect: Enemies within 10 meters suffer periodic mental damage, 30% resistance to mind control and fear

proc_effects.name: Psychic Blast
proc_effects.trigger: When using a blood magic ability
proc_effects.effect: Release a wave of psychic energy that confuses enemies for 5 seconds

proc_effects.name: Terror Manifestation
proc_effects.trigger: When surrounded by 3 or more enemies
proc_effects.effect: Create an illusion of the target's worst fear, causing them to flee in terror for 8 seconds

potion_system.creation_system: BloodCallers can create potions using a combination of herbs, minerals, monster parts, and blood. The quality and potency of ingredients directly affects the strength of both passive effects and proc chances. Blood from different creatures can add unique properties to potions. Creating potions requires an Alchemy Kit and appropriate ingredients, with more powerful potions requiring rarer components.

legendary_items.name: The Crimson Alembic
effects: Constitution increased by 5
Can create one additional dose of any potion without extra ingredients
Potion duration increased by 50%

legendary_items.name: Blooddrinker
effects: Attacks have a 30% chance to trigger a random potion proc regardless of conditions
Blood Power regeneration increased by 100% during combat
Can store blood from slain enemies to use as potion ingredients later

legendary_items.name: Vest of a Thousand Vials
effects: Alchemical Mastery maximum increased by 50
Can store up to 20 potions in extradimensional pockets
When health drops below 20%, automatically consume a random beneficial potion

lore: BloodCallers represent the darkest path a SpiritWalker can take, abandoning traditional spiritual magic in favor of blood rituals, forbidden alchemy, and the binding of spirits to physical vessels. These macabre practitioners have discovered that by infusing their blood with alchemical concoctions and spiritual essences, they can trigger powerful magical effects without the need for conventional spellcasting. The path to becoming a BloodCaller involves dangerous experimentation with one's own body, gradually replacing the natural connection to mana with an affinity for blood power and alchemical reactions. Those who survive this transformation find their bodies permanently altered—more resilient to toxins and capable of hosting multiple potion effects without the negative interactions that would kill ordinary beings. BloodCallers are feared and often shunned by other spiritual practitioners, who view their methods as a corruption of sacred traditions. Many operate as mercenaries, assassins, or battle-mages, using their unique abilities to devastating effect in combat. Some establish hidden laboratories where they conduct experiments on unwilling subjects, while others travel in search of rare ingredients and ancient alchemical knowledge. Their bodies, transformed by years of potion consumption and blood magic, often develop strange mutations that reflect their inner corruption—glowing eyes, unnaturally colored skin, or veins that visibly pulse with power beneath their skin. Despite the stigma attached to their practices, BloodCallers possess undeniable power, especially in combat situations where their ability to trigger multiple magical effects through their actions makes them unpredictable and deadly opponents.
